ch0106_10_kamitsure/0101_0701_01_10:
I'm liking your look today...
You’re brimming with energy.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10:
That's good. You have to look the part.
What do you say? Ready for an adventure?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_01_10:
I make sure that I never stop improving...
both as a Trainer and as a model.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_02_10:
First, I visualize the best version of myself—
the one I want to become.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_03_10:
Once I do that, I set specific, small goals that I can
achieve to get to my ultimate goal.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_04_10:
Then, I have to keep my will strong and keep
moving forward...
Nice and simple, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_01_10:
It can definitely be difficult to achieve the goals
that you set for yourself.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_02_10: I mean, even I’m no stranger to failure.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_03_10:
Whenever that happens...
the best thing you can do is to keep going and tell
yourself that you’ll do better next time.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_01_10:
Whenever people describe inspiration, don’t they
say it’s like a jolt of electricity?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_02_10:
I’ve always found that weird. I feel like you’d
more likely forget things if you were actually hit
by electricity, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_03_10:
*giggle*
Do you want to try it out?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_01_10:
I’m only joking. I wouldn’t actually think of
electrocuting anybody.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_02_10:
But wouldn’t it be wonderful to be an electrifying
inspiration for people?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_03_10:
I hope to become like that someday, both
as a model and as a Trainer.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_01_10:
My Rotom likes to go into my appliances to play
pranks on me.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_02_10:
It sometimes gets into my hair dryer in the
morning and makes my bedhead even worse
than it already is.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_03_10:
Other times, it gets into my toaster and burns
my toast to a crisp...
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_04_10: Mornings are always an uphill battle.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0702_01_10:
Rotom can be a pain in the neck, but its pranks
keep everything fresh for me!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0702_02_10:
Rotom’s serious when it comes to having fun!
It’s easy to forget how important that is.
We can all learn a thing or two from Rotom.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_01_10:
The designer who made this outfit totally
gets me.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_02_10:
Just a pretty outfit would be boring, and just
an eccentric one wouldn’t be satisfying enough.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_03_10:
But this outfit has the perfect balance between
beauty and eccentricity.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_01_10: This outfit totally fits my lifestyle in every way.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_02_10:
Although I pursue perfection, I still want to keep
the luxury of having some fun.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_03_10:
I’m all about mastering beauty and eccentricity!
That way, I can have some fabulous fun!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_01_10:
You don’t need any grandiose theatrics when you
meet somebody. There’s no such thing as a
“fated meeting.”
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_02_10:
The most dazzling stories are written after
the characters meet, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_03_10:
And only when they’ve had a beautiful story
written about them, then they can decide whether
their meeting was fated or not.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_01_10:
I wonder what kind of story will be written about
Rotom and me...or you and me...
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_02_10:
Of course, we can never know what the future
has in store for us.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_03_10:
And that can be a little scary, but I think it’s more
exciting than anything!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10: I’d like you to have this.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0701_02_10:
You’re always working so hard. I think this will
really help you out.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10:
Keep at it.
I’m cheering for you!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10: On my days off, I go shopping with Skyla a lot.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10:
We like to wander around and pick out clothes
we think would look good on each other.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_03_10:
But sometimes, Skyla chooses some weird
outfits for me to try on.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_04_10:
I guess it’s fine. I get to try out all sorts of outfits,
and Skyla seems to really enjoy it.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0702_01_10:
Skyla has such good style. I think she could totally
be a model, too, if she wanted to.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10:
It’d be really fun if we could walk the same
catwalk someday.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10:
When you’re a model and a Gym Leader, you
get to meet a lot of different people.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10:
Over the years, I’ve met a lot of people I respect.
Not only in Unova but here on Pasio, too.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10: And one of them is you.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_04_10:
You’re so earnest and kind, as a Trainer and just
as a person.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve never seen you be anything but nice to the
people and Pokémon around you.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10:
I say this without any sarcasm. It’s what makes
you so dazzling.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I have to wake up super early,
depending on what outfit I’m gonna wear.
Perfection takes time!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3002_0701_01_10:
The air’s so clean and fresh here...
It feels good to take a nice, deep breath.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s always super lively here around this time.
So many Trainers to chat with!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3004_0701_01_10:
I’m going for perfect posture—it makes me look
that much more fierce!
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10:
On nights when I can’t sleep, I step outside,
spread my arms, and bathe in the
moon’s spotlight.
ch0106_10_kamitsure/3006_0701_01_10:
Phew! My skin must be glistening after that
training session... Time to cool down so I can
do the same routine again tomorrow.
